subject: Important Message
description_text:
Hi. Did you receive the email I sent to you a few day's ago regarding possibly buying 5 sets ?

What is the best deal you can offer me for 5 of your 2 pedal sets in Silver and what is the delivery time to the UK ?

Many thanks.
Rick.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Rick,  Thank you for following up — and sorry, we didn't receive your message.  For your order of 5 silver 2-pedal sets, the best offer we can provide is:  ✔ 15% off + free shipping + no taxes  Use your exclusive discount code: Ricky15  You can place the order directly on our website.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals?variant=50297651003706  If you need any help with the checkout or have other questions, feel free to let us know!  Best regards, The Simsonn Team

Hi Guy's. Thank you for the reply and the generous offer ?

I am in the UK so what would the delivery time look like for me please ?

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Ricky Slater,      Express shipping takes approximately 4-7 days, standard shipping 7-10 days, and economy shipping 9-12 days.  Bulk purchase logistics typically take approximately 7-12 days.

Hi Guy's. I have purchased 1x set for testing and if I get on with them then I will buy 4 more sets.

I do have a question though.

I bought the one set as per the attached picture but I have not received any emails or confirmation whatsoever ?

Is this normal or should I have received an update ?

Are you able to offer an update please ?

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi Ricky Slater,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Due to recent shipping delays, your package has been dispatched and is expected to arrive on the 23rd.  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510402117810/trackdetails
